sentences.sContent: Alexander the Great beat every opponent between Greece and India.
sentences.sContent_eng: Alexander the Great beat every opponent between Greece and India.
sentences.sCn: 亚历山大大帝打败了希腊和印度之间的每个敌手。

sentences.sContent: But there are no special arrangements for Greece or for any other country.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there are no special arrangements for Greece or for any other country.
sentences.sCn: 但是对于希腊和任何别的国家，我们都不会特别对待。
